author: Akane Otani
title: Stocks Are Moving in Tandem. That Can Be Scary
text:
Shares of everything from manufacturers to banks to oil production firms are rebounding together after tumbling in unison earlier this month, a phenomenon that could lead to more turbulence as major indexes bounce back after suffering their first correction in two years.
Correlations among the S&P 500â€™s 11 sectors, a measure of how different stock groups move in relation to one another, spiked as global stocks came under pressure this month and further increased when stocks began bouncing back in recent sessions. They...
